r.d: This extension embeds a Handlebars interpreter into PHP, allowing the execution of Handlebars templates.
r.n: - Mustache delimiter preprocessing support behind the compat flag - Property lookup now generates a closure from a method if the value of the property is null or does not exist to emulate the behaviour of javascript where functions and properties share a symbol table - only supported for PHP 7 or greater - Changed target handlebars.c version to 0.6.4
